verses.verse: Let a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3049>account<s%> of <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of the <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3063>Moreover<s%> <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G2212>required<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3623>stewards,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G1698>me<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> very small <S%G1646>thing<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I should be <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G2250>judgment:<s%> <S%G235>yea,<s%> I <S%G350>judge<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> mine own <S%G1683>self.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G4894>know<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> by <S%G1683>myself;<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> am I <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G1344>justified:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G350>judgeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G5100>nothing<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> will bring to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will make <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1012>counsels<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1096>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I have in a figure <S%G3345>transferred<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G625>Apollos<s%> for your <S%G1223>sakes;<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye might <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%> of men <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you be puffed <S%G5448>up<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2087>another.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> maketh thee to <S%G1252>differ<s%> <S%G4571><s%> from another? <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> thou <S%G3739>that<s%> thou didst <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2983>receive?<s%> <S%G1161>now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou <S%G2532>didst<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> it, <S%G5101>why<s%> dost thou <S%G2744>glory,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou hadst <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> it?

Now <S%G2235><s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2880>full,<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> ye are <S%G4147>rich,<s%> ye have reigned as <S%G936>kings<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2257>us:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I would to <S%G3785>God<s%> <S%G1065><s%> ye did <S%G936>reign,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> might reign <S%G4821>with<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath set <S%G584>forth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2078>last,<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> appointed to <S%G1935>death:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G3474>fools<s%> for Christ's <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G772>weak,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G2478>strong;<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G1741>honorable,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G820>despised.<s%>

Even <S%G891>unto<s%> this <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> we <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1372>thirst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1130>naked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G2852>buffeted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have no certain dwelling <S%G790>place;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands:<s%> being <S%G3058>reviled,<s%> we <S%G2127>bless;<s%> being <S%G1377>persecuted,<s%> we <S%G430>suffer<s%> it:

Being <S%G987>defamed,<s%> we <S%G3870>entreat:<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4027>filth<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and are the <S%G4067>offscouring<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> this <S%G737>day.<s%>

I <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to <S%G1788>shame<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%> I <S%G3560>warn<s%> you.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3807>instructors<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> have ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>
Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> ye <S%G3402>followers<s%> of <S%G3450>me.<s%>

For this <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5124><s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>son,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> shall bring you into <S%G363>remembrance<s%> <S%G5209><s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> be <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G1321>teach<s%> every <S%G3837>where<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> would <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5030>shortly,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>will,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> of them which are puffed <S%G5448>up,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> ye? shall I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness?<s%>
